description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Pirate-themed defense game combines real-time strategy and puzzle gameplay in one slick and action-packed package.  You are in charge of a tropical archipelago and must carefully use each island's geography to outwit enemy pirates.  Use the zoom-able display to glory in the details of your victories!  Unique puzzle island maps and features will push your skills as far as you care to take them!
